thread.title: Meanwhile, Australia's in the grip of an intense heatwave straight from hell
thread.title_full: Meanwhile, Australia's in the grip of an intense heatwave straight from hell

author: Johnny Lieu
title: Meanwhile, Australia's in the grip of an intense heatwave straight from hell
text:
Meanwhile, Australia's in the grip of an intense heatwave straight from hell 93 If you can't stand the heat, get someone to squirt you with a drink bottle. Image: Morne de Klerk/Getty Images 2017-02-10 00:43:42 UTC 
Yes, Australia is a hot place. But this weekend, it's really, really hot. Everywhere. 
Much of the country is enduring an epic heatwave, with severe to extreme conditions along the eastern coast that's taking temperatures above 40 degrees Celsius (104 degrees Fahrenheit.) 
â€” Dan Ilic ðŸ’¨ðŸ’¨ðŸ’¨ (@danilic) February 9, 2017 
The hellmouth basically opened up. Don't believe us? Here's a map showing how hot it is. It's so hot that weather presenters have had to use deep purple to illustrate it. meanwhile in australia pic.twitter.com/fUXfLnVMNb 
â€” a beeb (@espurrkawa) February 8, 2017 
That expression couldn't be more "this is fine"-esque. meanwhile in australia pic.twitter.com/kdtD98w7X6 
â€” salvador amygdali (@maxuthink) February 8, 2017 
Just look at it. 
â€” Deng Nguyen (@deng_nguyen) February 9, 2017 
With the threat of electricity cuts in New South Wales and South Australia looming, everyone is doing their best to keep cool. Dogs knew what was up early. It's nearly 30 degrees at 9:40am in Sydney and this dog is just sitting in a park fountain pic.twitter.com/Ay4sBf2wRt
